sections.heading: Writ; when not issued.The writ of mandamus may not be issued in any case where there is a plain and adequate remedy in the ordinary course of the law
sections.text: It may issue on the information of the party beneficially interested.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 646, p. 507;R.S.1913, ยง 8272;C.S.1922, ยง 9225;C.S.1929, ยง
